scripts.publish:major: ng test && npm version major && ng build ngx-vflow-lib && cd ../../dist/ngx-vflow-lib && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: ng test && npm version minor && ng build ngx-vflow-lib && cd ../../dist/ngx-vflow-lib && npm publish
scripts.publish:preminor: ng test && npm version preminor && ng build ngx-vflow-lib && cd ../../dist/ngx-vflow-lib && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: ng test && npm version patch && ng build ngx-vflow-lib && cd ../../dist/ngx-vflow-lib && npm publish
